title: Fix production deployment failure and smooth intro-to-quiz transition

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the production publishing/deployment error so the app can be successfully built and published to production.
acceptanceCriteria: A production publish attempt completes successfully without a deployment error.
The deployed production URL loads and renders the quiz app without a blank screen or runtime errors.
If the deployment issue was caused by missing/static assets (e.g., /assets/generated/*, /assets/buzz.mp3), ensure the build includes them and they are served correctly in production.

requirements.text: Implement a smoother visual transition from the Intro screen to Level 1 (fade or similar), so starting the quiz feels seamless.

quotes: Looks all set ‚Äî would you like the intro animation to fade into the first question more smoothly?

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking ‚ÄúStart the Quiz‚Äù triggers a smooth transition from IntroSlide to Level1 (no abrupt cut).
The transition works on mobile and desktop and does not block user interaction longer than the intended animation duration.
The transition does not regress existing intro animations or level rendering.

requirements.text: Verify in the production build that all quiz question titles and prompts render fully (no truncation/half-cut), especially on small mobile screens, and fix any remaining layout/CSS issues causing cut-off text.

quotes: I can re‚Äërun the build and fix the issues (full questions not showing and smoother romantic animation) after checking the code.

acceptanceCriteria: On small mobile viewport sizes, every level‚Äôs question/title text wraps to multiple lines and is fully readable (no clipping).
No container uses overflow settings that cut off question text vertically.
The fix is verified in the built production bundle (not only in dev).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend logic if required to resolve the deployment failure.

Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui). Compose components instead.
Use English for any user-facing text introduced or modified by these changes.
nonGoals: Adding new quiz levels, changing existing questions/answers, or altering the final completion message.
Introducing new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Adding external databases, third-party backends, or real-time/websocket features.
